contentrichtext.text: {{notability|date=December 2009}} {{Inappropriate tone|date=December 2007}} '''Greg Knauss''' is an [[United States|American]] [[Internet]] [[humor]]ist and [[computer programmer]]. He was born in [[Torrance, California]]. In college at the [[University of California, San Diego]], he was the editor of [[John Muir College|Muir College]] ''Erratically'', a small humor publication, as well as a frequent contributor to the ''[[UCSD Guardian]]'' student newspaper. Some of his ''Erratically'' work was later reprinted online in the early Internet-based magazine ''InterText'', edited by fellow UCSD alumnus [[Jason Snell]].<ref>[http://www.intertext.com/magazine/best/best_browser.html InterText - The Best of InterText]</ref> Snell also published Knauss's early blog-like e-mail missives on the Internet in a collection known as ''An Entirely Other Day.'' In 1996 Knauss and Snell helped found TeeVee.org, a site powered by software written by Knauss himself.<ref>[http://www.teevee.org/about/ TeeVee.org - About Us]</ref> Knauss was also an original contributor to [[Suck.com]]<ref>[http://www.suck.com/fish/contributors/knauss/ Suck.com - Contributors]</ref> and creator of WinerLog. Knauss is also the author of "Rainy Day Fun and Games for Toddler and Total Bastard" (So New Media) and pioneered the [[weblog]] book tour to promote it.<ref>[http://www.austinchronicle.com/gyrobase/Issue/story?oid=oid%3A101222 Books: On Paper: So New Media: something old, something new, something borrowed, something to do - The Austin Chronicle]</ref><ref>[http://www.wired.com/culture/lifestyle/news/2002/04/51632 (Book Clubs') Life After Oprah]</ref> He also created [[Metababy]], an early wiki-like community.<ref>[http://www.metababy.com/meta/index.html Metababy - About]</ref> Knauss lives with his wife and three children in [[Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California|Woodland Hills]], California. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.eod.com/ Personal website], An Entirely Other Day * [http://www.sonewpublishing.com/catalog/rainy-day-fun-and-games-for-toddler-and-total-bastard Rainy Day Fun And Games For Toddler And Total Bastard] * [http://www.teevee.org/ TeeVee.org] * [[Fray]]: [http://fray.com/is/greg/ Contributor page] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Knauss, Greg | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Knauss, Greg}} [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American bloggers]] [[Category:University of California, San Diego alumni]] [[Category:Place of birth missing (living people)]] {{US-compu-bio-stub}}
